What are the supported versions of OSX/macOS for Verus Desktop and Verus CLI wallet, and how can I uninstall Verus from an unsupported version of OSX/macOS?

The supported versions of OSX/macOS for Verus Desktop are macOS 10.12.x and later. If you try to install Verus Desktop on OSX 10.11.x or earlier, the wallet will not function and will not complete the initial sync. On the other hand, the Verus CLI wallet is expected to run without issues on lower versions of OSX/macOS.

If you need to uninstall Verus from an unsupported version of OSX/macOS, follow these steps:

1. Quit the Verus wallet application.
2. Eject the Verus wallet dmg (disk image).
3. Make a backup of the `wallet.dat` and `VRSC.conf` files if you need to preserve your wallet data.
4. Move the `Agama.app` file from the Applications folder to the Trash.
5. Delete the `~/Library/Application Support/Agama` folder by moving it to the Trash or by using the command `rmdir /Users//Library/Application\ Support/Agama` in the Terminal.
6. Delete the `~/Library/Application Support/Komodo` folder by moving it to the Trash or by using the command `rmdir /Users//Library/Application\ Support/Komodo` in the Terminal.
7. Upgrade your OS to a supported version.
8. Install Agama.

Note that the Verus wallet data is stored in the `/Users//Library/Application Support/Komodo/VRSC` directory on Mac OS.

# What versions of OSX/macOS are supported?

## Verus Desktop

Currently only macOS 10.12.x and up are tested and supported for Verus Desktop. Installing Verus Desktop on OSX 10.11.x or earlier may be possible but the wallet does not function and never completes the initial sync.

## Verus CLI wallet

The CLI wallet should run on lower versions without problems.

## File location

`VRSC Wallet and Data location` on Mac OS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/Komodo/VRSC`

### Necessary files:

Link 1: [How-To install the latest Wallet](#!/how-to/how-to_bootstrap.md)

## Procedure:

If you installed on OSX 10.11.x or earlier and need to remove it:

1. Quit your Wallet.
2. Eject the wallet dmg.
3. Make a backup of `wallet.dat` & `VRSC.conf` if necessary (Only if you had a wallet on this machine or if you used an existing `wallet.dat`)
4. If you installed the `Agama.app` in Applications, move this to the trash.
5. Move `~/Library/Application Support/Agama` to the trash or use the following command in terminal
`rmdir /Users//Library/Application\ Support/Agama`.
6. Move `~/Library/Application Support/Komodo` to the trash or use the following command in terminal
`rmdir /Users//Library/Application\ Support/Komodo`.
7. Upgrade OS.
8. Install Agama (Check `Link1` for a smooth install)
